import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './TransactionResults.css'; import { calculateTotals } from '../utils/aiParser'; import { exportToExcel } from '../utils/excelExport'; function TransactionResults({ transactions, onReset }) { const [view, setView] = useState('summary'); const totals = calculateTotals(transactions); const grandTotal = transactions.reduce((sum, t) => sum + t.amount, 0); const handleExport = () => { exportToExcel(transactions, totals); }; return (

‚úÖ Transactions Processed

{view === 'summary' && (
{transactions.length}
Transactions
${grandTotal.toFixed(2)}
Total Spent
{totals.length}
Categories

Transaction Summaries

{transactions.map(t => (
{getCategoryIcon(t.category)}
{t.summary}
{t.date} ‚Ä¢ {t.category}
${t.amount.toFixed(2)}
))}
)} {view === 'table' && (
{transactions.map(t => ( ))}
Date Vendor Category Amount Raw Vendor
{t.date} {t.vendor} {t.category} ${t.amount.toFixed(2)} {t.rawVendor}
Total ${grandTotal.toFixed(2)}
)} {view === 'categories' && (

Spending by Category

{totals.map(({ category, total }) => (
{getCategoryIcon(category)} {category}
${total.toFixed(2)} ({((total / grandTotal) * 100).toFixed(1)}%)
))}
)}
); } function getCategoryIcon(category) { const icons = { 'Grocery': 'üõí', 'Restaurants': 'üçî', 'Transportation': 'üöó', 'Shopping': 'üõçÔ∏è', 'Entertainment': 'üé¨', 'Gas': '‚õΩ', 'Pharmacy': 'üíä', 'Alcohol': 'üç∑', 'Other': 'üì¶' }; return icons[category] || 'üì¶'; } export default TransactionResults;
